author: brane
msg: On the dump-load-cross-check branch: Fix almost all the test failures
in svnsync_authz_tests.py when using dump/load check via svnserve.
(write_authz_file): Add an optional parameter that is a set of
authz rules where paths already contain the repository prefix.
copy_delete_unreadable_child): Use the new capability of
write_authz_file to create the authz files for these

author: fschumacher
msg: Log failure to close a resource instead of ignoring it silently.

author: stsp
msg: Add more svn_uri_canonicalize() test cases for multiple slashes

author: fschumacher
msg: Close input and output streams in expandCGIScript to
avoid resource leaks. Issue reported by Coverity Scan.

author: fschumacher
msg: Close the inputstream that was used to get the content of
the readme file. Issue reported by Coverity Scan.
